decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (15/100 01, 15/100 02. Received 11/06/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The extension hereby approved shall not be used before the previously approved planning application 00162/A/P13 is implemented and the associated on-site car parking spaces are operational and these shall be permanently retained thereafter and made available for visitors to the site at all times when the premises are open.
description: Erection of a single storey attached building for use as a conservatory/tea room
